select c.id as id, c.user_id as userId, c.user_oid as userOid, c.employee_id as employeeId, c.full_name as fullName, c.title as title, d.name as departmentName from sys_contact c left join sys_department_user du on du.user_id = c.user_id left join sys_department d on d.id = du.department_id
c.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
and c.full_name like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
and c.employee_id like concat(concat('%',#{code}),'%')
ORDER BY c.employee_id

SELECT c.user_id id, c.id contact_id, c.user_oid, c.status, c.leaving_date, c.full_name, c.employee_id, c.title, c.email, c.duty, c.rank_info, c.gender, c.entry_date, c.birthday, c.direct_manager, c.corporation_oid, cc.id company_id, cc.company_oid, cc.set_of_books_id, cc.tenant_id, cc.name company_name, cc.company_code, d.id department_id, d.department_oid department_oid, d.name department_name, p.phone_number mobile FROM sys_contact c LEFT JOIN sys_company cc ON cc.id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN sys_department_user du ON du.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department d ON d.id = du.department_id LEFT JOIN sys_phone p on (c.id = p.contact_id AND p.is_primary = 1) WHERE c.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and c.full_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
AND c.employeeId LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
select c.email from sys_contact c where c.status = 1001 and c.email = #{email}

SELECT user_id as id, user_oid AS userOid, full_name, title, employee_id AS employeeCode, company_id FROM sys_contact WHERE 1 = 1
${ew.sqlSegment}

select temp.set_of_books_id, temp.company_id, temp.department_id, temp.user_id, temp.user_oid, temp.department_oid, temp.company_oid, augu.user_group_id from (select ac.set_of_books_id, ac.id company_id, ac.company_oid company_oid, ad.id department_id, ad.department_oid department_oid, au.user_id user_id, au.user_oid user_oid from sys_contact au LEFT JOIN sys_company ac on au.company_id = ac.id LEFT JOIN sys_department_user adu on au.user_id = adu.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department ad on adu.department_id = ad.id where au.user_id = #{userId}) temp left join sys_user_group_user augu ON temp.user_id = augu.user_id

select t3.tenant_id, t3.user_id id, t3.user_oid, t3.full_name, t3.employee_id employee_code, t3.title, t3.gender, t3.company_id, t2.phone_number, t3.email, t3.status from sys_phone t2, sys_contact t3 where 1 = 1 and t2.contact_id = t3.id and t3.employee_id is not null and t3.status != 1003 and t3.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
